title: Premium Cable Consciousness

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: They say: 'Oh hey, that normal you you're so attached to? That's just one channel. And we've got premium cable back here.'
dialogue.context: Playing with remote control while watching TV, explaining altered states as channel-surfing consciousness

scene_context: The Architect plays with a TV remote control, using channel-surfing as a metaphor for how altered states reveal consciousness has multiple channels beyond our default setting.
philosophical_theme: Normal consciousness as just one limited channel among many possibilities
visual_elements: The AI with remote control, TV displaying multiple channels
